description: Test suite for the convert_schema function in Gemini Dict field support, including various schema conversions and edge cases.

methods.name: test_convert_schema_dict_field_integer
methods.description: Tests conversion of Dict[str, int] schema to placeholder properties.

methods.name: test_convert_schema_dict_field_string
methods.description: Tests conversion of Dict[str, str] schema to placeholder properties.

methods.name: test_convert_schema_dict_field_number
methods.description: Tests conversion of Dict[str, float] schema to placeholder properties.

methods.name: test_convert_schema_dict_field_with_description
methods.description: Ensures that the original description is preserved in the schema conversion.

methods.name: test_convert_schema_dict_field_without_description
methods.description: Checks default description assignment when none is provided.

methods.name: test_convert_schema_regular_object_still_works
methods.description: Verifies normal object schemas with properties are processed correctly.

methods.name: test_convert_schema_object_with_additional_properties_false
methods.description: Tests object with additionalProperties set to false.

methods.name: test_convert_schema_object_with_additional_properties_true
methods.description: Tests object with additionalProperties set to true.

methods.name: test_convert_schema_empty_object
methods.description: Checks handling of empty object schemas.

methods.name: test_convert_schema_nested_dict_in_properties
methods.description: Verifies nested schemas with Dict fields within properties.

methods.name: test_convert_schema_dict_field_case_insensitive_type
methods.description: Ensures type conversion handles different case inputs correctly.
